definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be like, resemble (NH id., Aram. [[דְּמֵי]], [[דְּמָא]], dmo0; cf. [[דמין]], dmayo0 price, Nab. [[דמי]] id. (Nö in Eut:Nab. Inscr. p. 35); also dmuwto0, and duwmyo0 likeness (whence Ar. dumyah;un image, effigy, as loan-wd. Frä:272) cf. [[דְּמוּת]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ד]] Ez Eze 31:8, Ps 144:4; 3 fs. [[דָּֽמְתָה]] Ct So 7:8; 2 ms. [[דָּמִיתָ]] Ez Eze 31:2, Eze 31:18; 1 s. [[דָּמִיתִי]] Ps 102:7; 3 pl. [[דָּמוּ]] Ez Eze 31:8; 1 pl. [[דָּמִינוּ]] Is 1:9; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִדְמֶה]] Ps 89:7; 1 pl. [[וְנִדְמֶה]] consec. Is 46:5; Imv. ms. [[דְּמֵה]] Ct So 2:17, So 8:14; Pt. [[דּוֹמֶה]] Ct So 2:9; —be like, resemble, of external appearance, sq. [[לְ]], Ct So 7:8, So 2:9, So 2:17, So 8:14; sq. [[אֶל־]] Ez Eze 31:8, Eze 31:8, Eze 31:18 (all of tree, fig. of Pharaoh); of condition or quality sq. [[לְ]] Is 1:9, Ps 102:7, Ps 144:4; so [[יִדְמֶה ליהוה]]…[[מִי ]] Ps 89:7; also abs. Is 46:5; sq. [[אֶל]] Ez Eze 31:2.
liken, i.e. consider to be like, compare, causat. of

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: sq. [[לְ]] of external appearance Ct So 1:9; of quality or condition Is 46:5 (obj. ´[[י]]) La 2:13; sq. [[אֶל]] of external appearance Is 40:18, Is 40:25 (both obj. God in ref. to idols); abs. use comparisons or similitudes (parables, symbols, etc.) Ho 12:11 (subj. ´[[י]]).

imagine, form an idea, devise 2Sa 21:5 (on context cf. Dr); think, intend, sq. Inf. Nu 33:56 (J or H) Ju Jdg 20:5, Es 4:13; abs. Is 10:7 cf. Is 14:24; think that, sq. obj. cl. (Impf. without conj.) Ps 50:21; think of, sq. acc. Ps 48:10. Hithp. make oneself or become like; Impf. [[אֶדַּמֶּה לְעֶלְיוֹן]] Is 14:14 I will make myself like the Most High (on form cf. Ges:§ 54. 2).
